Highlights

You and Minot are both in Climate Change / ESG Professionals Group, The ReGeneration, and 1 other

About

I work in project finance.  At present we are favoring large projects in the following areas: development and/or prefabrication of low-cost/high-performance housing, mixed-use infill and redevelopment projects, renewable energy, water cycle restoration, reclamation of degraded landscapes at scale as well as regenerative forestry, agro-forestry and agriculture projects.
